radiographic_examinations.findings: Findings consistent with sinusitis and otitis media of the left ear.

Normal mediastinal contours without evidence of lymphadenopathy or cardiomegaly, clear pleural spaces without evidence of an effusion, and clear lungs without evidence of opacities, apical scarring, or calcified granulomas.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Irregular circumferential mass in the ascending colon measuring 4.5 cm in the craniocaudal dimension with transmural extension, stranding in the adjacent pericolonic fat, and adjacent enlarged mesenteric lymph nodes.
